issue.description:
The select for resource_as_realized has been extended to include activity_method. Yet actual resources cannot be consumed except in an activity_actual or event. Activity_method is always typical, not individual or actual. Remove activity_method and applied_activity_method_assignment from select type.
It might be better to just include activity_actual and event, plus a subtype of Applied_activity_assignment constrained to refer to activity_actual.
Issue raised as part of TRILS/PLCS mapping effort.
